CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code: local currentPath = self.Entity.Path self.hpText = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath(currentPath .. "/Hp/text_value").TextComponent -- 체력바 구성 self.hpBar = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath(currentPath .. "/Hp/img_bar").UITransformComponent self.maxWidth_HP = self.hpBar.RectSize.x

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnUpdate
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if self.hpBar ~= nil then -- 체력 깎이고 회복하는 UI local hp = self.Entity.Common.HP local maxhp = self.Entity.Common.MaxHP self.hpBar.RectSize = Vector2(hp / maxhp * self.maxWidth_HP,self.hpBar.RectSize.y) self.hpText.Text = string.format("%d / %d", hp,maxhp) end
